description:
According to Ken'ichi Ohmichi's TODO comment,
The parameter in nova/api/openstack/compute/plugins/v3/agents.py function: update name "para" is different from the ones of the other APIs. Most other names are resource names like "server" etc. This name should be changed to "agent" for consistent naming with v2.1+microversions.
title: The input parameter for agents update is different from other APIs

comments.content: The parameter in nova/api/openstack/compute/plugins/v3/agents.py function: update name "para" is different from the ones of the other APIs. Most other names are resource names like "server" etc. This name should be changed to "agent" for consistent naming with v2.1+microversions.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~zhengzhenyu
